eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Marion; Polk, OR; at 10:35 AM ON DEC 19, 2025 Effective until 11:35 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Moderate flooding is imminent along Salems Mill Creek, Shelton Ditch, and Lower Pringle Creek, North of Mission Street.  Water levels will start to recede between 2pm and 7pm today.  See www.CityofSalem.net for current conditions and road closures.  
Sandbag location is at 2100 Ferry St/Mill Race Park at the North side of the park
